title: La nuit où Laurier Gaudreault s'est réveillé
overview: The Night Logan Wakes Up is an adaptation of the popular stage play La nuit où Laurier Gaudreault s'est réveillé from playwright Michel Marc Bouchard. The series, which mixes horror, humour and drama, takes place in the early 1990s and follows Mimi and her brother Jules, who are best friends with Logan.
